title: And the Pool Party Pentathlon winners are...

replies.body: Wait a second... how can {{champion:64}} swoon after {{champion:21}} smiles if he can't see???
The eyes are blind, but the heart can see.

{{champion:64}} isn't blind, he's just faking it for the attention. That headband is actually see-through.

If he were really blind, {{champion:17}}'s Blind Dart wouldn't work on him. It's all a ruse...

_Day 1354..._

_They still think I'm blind._  {{champion:64}}
so he spent 576 days after his release day not blind? because its been 1930 days lmao, sorry to ruin the joke

They mentioned it a while back, enough people don't really know of it anymore. Lee sees with seismic vibrations, like how Toph would see people despite being blind as well. He can still see her smiling, though in a different way...
Nah {{champion:64}} is actually daredevil
Somehow that is creepy... *Inside Lee Sin's head* *YES SHE IS SMILING I CAN FEEL THE TEETH AND THE MOUTH AND THE TONGUE AND THE F-*
A better question is why is {{champion:89}} swooning?
Did you just assume her sexuality? Have you ever heard of {{champion:89}} x {{champion:131}} ?
Nothing says "I love you" Like killing everyone in the solari but her.
Hey... Did you just assume Leona's gender ?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

shut.
up.
Logged in just to get this.  Leona <3 MF forever
He bought Oracles.
He just swooned after everyone else so he wouldn't feel left out.
There is an error in that story. {{champion:119}} would only be giving drinks and swooning only for {{champion:119}}.
Why is {{champion:119}} in a place with no other {{champion:119}}  anyways?
There is other {{champion:119}}, just wait for one for all to come back out.
{{champion:89}} swooning over {{champion:21}}. Poor {{champion:131}}

Pool Party Leona with Pool Party MF, 2 hot red heads. That's a something I can get behind.
....
....
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
and in front of... and between...
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
{{champion:421}}  has a way with words that just gets me. Much eloquence. {{summoner:14}}

{{champion:44}}  Did not swoon over {{champion:21}} while everyone else did

{{champion:44}}{{summoner:4}}{{champion:81}}
The only surefire way to make him swoon is giving him a mirror.
1. the poll is rigged{{champion:119}} should have won all of those
This makes me moist.
{{champion:267}} (ノಠ益ಠ)ノ
The shrieks from {{champion:421}}  had me dieing
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} tfw no pool party ahri {{champion:103}}
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) can you feel it Mr Krabs? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:89}} swoons over {{champion:21}} ?

Is this the next {{champion:44}} x {{champion:81}} ?
Such a good support fell in love with ADC
Rest in piece Mr. Crab. You were so close to getting us even more "plot" with these skins.
{{champion:114}} pulled a Hercules and Mr. Crab became Cancer. His story is in the stars now.
i KNEW leona was a lesbian
i mean bisexual is always an option? i mean there was still that moment with her and pantheon on mount targon.
What happens on targon stays on targon.
UH OH!!! Taric's shirt commin' off! {{champion:81}}  is weak {{summoner:3}}
Ezreal likes Lux though.
I think it's reversed.
When the {{champion:21}} skin turns you on

My favorite part about pool party skins is the backgrounds of the art. That being said Katarina has been in the background in almost all of them and you still haven't given her a pool party skin, c'mon RIOT
I appreciate MF's splash because Lee Sin is holding his phone upside down
Think about what you're asking for. A Katarina in every game for a few weeks. Do you really want to be supporting that chaos?
Am I the only one here who wants the rubber duck icon more than the actual skins?
{{champion:154}} Time to get more girls wet
{{champion:44}} * winks * <-This was my favorite part by far
